name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jeffrey JOHNSON, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jeffrey JOHNSON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Daniel M. Preminger, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Ann C. Lebowitz, Asst. Dist. Atty., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1014
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jeffrey JOHNSON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 26, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
Daniel M. Preminger, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Ann C. Lebowitz, Asst. Dist. Atty., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
